Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: The root cause appears to be that transient data sent by the client along with transaction proposals is not being delivered correctly to Node chaincode. The Node chaincode returns an empty Map for the transient data. The client is sending the transient data correctly and it is received correctly by Go and Java chaincode.

Action.author: mbwhite
Action.body: I'll need to grab the latest code and reproduce the failure; sounds like this should be on the fabric-chaincode-node project.

Action.author: sstone1
Action.body: The Node.js chaincode is failing to publish chaincode events properly. The event name property of chaincode events is not being set. The test uses transient data to pass in the event name and payload, and the test checks that the correct event was emitted.
